Reviews.Title: Memory Card not Formatted
Reviews.Author: Jackie Langley
Reviews.Content: The memory card is not preformatted as specified in write-up, the card doesn't work in my CX7300 Camera, tried emailing manufacturer twice have not received a response.  Manufacturer is located in UK, I do have phone number but probably will cost me just as much to make a phone call as the cost of the Memory Card.  Am dissatisfied with the manufactures service.

ProductInfo.Features:
Lifetime Warranty
2GB Capacity
Manual Lock Switch for Data Protection
Tested to Full Capacity
Formatted for Kodak EasyShare CX7300
ProductInfo.Name: 2GB Memory Card for Kodak EasyShare CX7300 digital camera/camcorder
